summary: The CW is an American TV network owned mostly by Nexstar Media Group. It was created in 2006 by joining two other networks, UPN and The WB. The name comes from the first letters of its founders, CBS and Warner Bros. The CW shows are for people aged 18 to 34 and air every day. It's also available in Canada and Mexico through cable and some border stations. The network has shows like "America's Next Top Model" and aims to have a mix of programs for both men and women.
title: The CW
